*** Settings ***
Test Template     Do uppercase
Library           String

*** Test Cases ***
Convert To Uppercases
    abcd    ABCD
    1234    1234
    a1b2C3d4e    A1B2C3D4E
    ${EMPTY}    ${EMPTY}
    ööääåå    ÖÖÄÄÅÅ

*** Keywords ***
Do uppercase
    [Arguments]    ${arg1}    ${arg2}
    ${result} =    Convert To Uppercase    ${arg1}
    Should be Equal    ${result}    ${arg2}
